column5: I was looking over my hott spots map of erie and was wondering if anyone ever fished grubb reef(just off of point pelee)??? What were your results for walleye?? I was thinking of taking an weekend adventure on lake erie and was wondering if this would be a good spot to catch some trophy eyes???
Well I guess the hog walleye must be there but you guys don't want to give up your honey hole do ya???
go to geneva on the Lake, hottest port on the great lakes right now!!!!
